automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_sunset_warm_white_60pct'
alias: 'Office WLED Sunset Warm White 60%'
description: "At sunset, automatically set the Office WLED to a cozy, warm white at 60% brightness."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: sun
    event: sunset
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 60
      rgb_color:
        - 255
        - 200
        - 150
